channel.title: When i make a new server does it mean other players can join me?
channel.description: if i make a new server and like run it as no-ip can anyone else join it apart from me??? cus when ever i register it online moparscape server status page it says my server is offline even though... i think im on it but i cant change it

item.title: When i make a new server does it mean other players can join me?
item.dc:creator: @fuck_me_now fuck me now
item.description:

lol… o thats what that Sh7ts for =] okies then tyvm

item.title: When i make a new server does it mean other players can join me?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

RSPS Master:

You have to port forward your router in order for people to connect the server ip.

Epic Ancient just said that, there’s no point in repeating him.

Read full topic
